synopsis.text: Club to club, Kensei Maeshima lends his athletic prowess, but never stays, haunted by his past defeat in figure skating. When his old rival, Reo Shinozaki, announces his move to the team sport of skate-leading, Maeshima's world takes a dramatic turn. Enter Hayato Sasugai, a boy well-versed in Maeshima's skating history, who extends an invitation to join the competitive world of skate-leading. As Maeshima steps back onto the ice, he must confront his past, reconcile with his teammates, and strive to outshine his rival in this thrilling new sport. This anime premiered on Funimation, AnimeLab, and Wakanim on December 27, 2020, followed by a Japanese broadcast on January 10, 2021.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
